bibl.title: Photograph of a property map of Columbia Barracks, Havana, Cuba, with annotations by Philip Showalter Hench and Albert E. Truby, February 7, 1912

div1.head: Photograph of a property map of Columbia Barracks, Havana, Cuba, with annotations by Philip Showalter Hench and Albert E. Truby, February 7, 1912
div1.p:
C2
B3
This is a portion of the C
“Property map of Columbia Barracks Reservation”
etc. (see title over)
This map is in the office of the chief of Engineers
Ciudad Military, Havana, Cuba
Borrowed & photographed by me in April 1941
Dr. P.S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minn.
A copy (blue print) of this map is in the
National Archives, Washington, D.C.
I am anxious to get a copy of the
original map - ie. a complete blueprint.
9/24/58
I have my enlargement to
Pedro Nogueira
He will get whole map
at Cuidad Militar

Note the name Zamora on the property
map) just “west” of the RR track.
Pogoloth told me that was
formerly used by Father Zamora.
O.K.
